section_title:
16a01 - CCPA general provisions and
Wage-Hour’s authority.
text:
(a)   The CCPA limits the amount of an employee’s earnings
that may be garnished (see FOH 16b00) and protects an employee from being fired
because wages are garnished for any single debt. (See FOH 16c00.) (b)  WH has no other authority with regard to garnishments.
Questions over issues other than the amount being garnished under the CCPA or
termination should be referred to the court or agency initiating the
withholding action.
html:
(a)   The CCPA limits the amount of an employee’s earnings that may be garnished (see FOH 16b00) and protects an employee from being fired because wages are garnished for any single debt. (See FOH 16c00.)

 

(b)  WH has no other authority with regard to garnishments. Questions over issues other than the amount being garnished under the CCPA or termination should be referred to the court or agency initiating the withholding action.
